io.spine.server.entity

Class EventBlackList

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.EventBlackList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFilter

    public final class EventBlackList
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventFilter
    An EventFilter which allows any events except for the events of given types.
    See Also:
    EventWhiteList
